question:
Consider the following pairs of lakes with states where they are located:
  1. Tso Lhamo Lake - Sikkim
  2. Nal Sarovar - Gujarat
  3. Sheshnag Lake - Jammu & Kashmir
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Tso Lhamo Lake is one of the highest lakes in the world, located at an altitude of 5,330 m in Sikkim. Sheshnag Lake is an alpine high altitude oligotrophic lake situated in Anantnag district of Jammu & Kashmir. Nal Sarovar is situated in Ahmedabad district in Gujarat.
